pkgmetadata.longdescription: Simultaneous Threshold Interaction Modeling Algorithm // Regression trunk model estimation proposed by Dusseldorp and Meulman (2004) doi:10.1007/bf02295641 and Dusseldorp, Conversano, Van Os (2010) doi:10.1198/jcgs.2010.06089, integrating a regression tree and a multiple regression model.
